entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who gave Harry a sharp look and asked him about Neville's parents. He is described as Professor Moody's counterpart in terms of being an Auror.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who received a sharp look from Dumbledore and was asked about Neville's parents.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as the person whose parents were being discussed by Dumbledore. He has been brought up by his grandmother.

entities.name: frank
entities.description: Frank is Neville's father and an Auror who was tortured for information about Voldemort's whereabouts.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one whose powers were lost, leading to his followers being tortured for information.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Professor Moody is mentioned as an Auror and a counterpart of Dumbledore.

entities.name: neville's grandmother
entities.description: Neville's grandmother is the one who brought him up.

relationships.description: Dumbledore asked Harry about Neville's parents.
Dumbledore mentioned Neville in the context of his parents.
Harry is related to Neville, as they have known each other for almost four years.
Frank was tortured by Voldemort's followers for information about Voldemort's whereabouts.
Dumbledore and Moody are counterparts in terms of being Aurors.
